reviews: This app is amazing, it allows you to view health status of the pants in farm anywhere in the world, using satellite data, for free. I never even knew such data and it's visualization of farms was possible. I love these visualizations and track random lands in random countries to compare the performance of farms in different regions.

I used the app to get some advice on plants I was working on for my academic thesis. The answers I received from the experts on my problems were comprehensive and solution oriented. They were detailed enough for me to mention in my academic writing as well. Recommend this to everyone!
This is what I would say Innovation actually is. I can easily check crop status remotely anywhere around the world. Kudos to the team.
Useful app! Interactive, easy to use UI. Heralds the future of smart farming in the developing world. Way to go!
Wow. This app is the epitome of smart agriculture. Simply amazing and user friendly too. Kudos to the team!
Fake app.. Useless Map not updated... Data are used from general weather
Great user experience and very useful product for any agriculturist. Highly recommended!!
It is a well-developed app that tracks crop. It is very useful for smart agriculture
Best app for monitoring crop health by normal differential vegetation index satellite data visualization.
Very useful app. Thank you PlantSat Team for bringing such innovation to the forefront.
This is what i was waiting for, it is free and i am glad that someone made up with these kinda app
Great app.... Exactly what i needed and so simple to use..
